
====================================================================================

               >>>   Example 1a - Talbot Suite DE   <<<

         Application of Talbot's method to solve the PDE equation

			u_t (x,t) = u_x (x,t),         x > X0,  t>0

	with conditions:
			u(x,0+) = x
			u(X0,t) = X0 + t


	The analytical solution is

		u(x,t) = x + t

	and its Laplace Transform is

		          1     x
		U(x,s) = --- + ---
		         s^2    s

	with a double pole at 0

	     and abscissa of convergence: sigma0 = 0

====================================================================================

	   Ex. 1a: output from ./2PAR/LTS1_fun/OMP_main_ACCURACY.c

	LT samples by means of a function

	      5 t in [100, 500],    9 x in [10, 20],    tol=1.000000e-012
====================================================================================


CHECK: NESTED PARALLELISM is not supported
                          Now it is supported

RELERR1 = [ % COARSE-GRAIN OMP PARALLELISM with 4 threads for modified Talbot's method
